sn37.29:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these five powers of a female.
sn37.29:1.3: Attractiveness, wealth, relatives, children, and ethical behavior.
sn37.29:1.4: A female who has the power of attractiveness but not the power of wealth
sn37.29:1.6: But when she has the power of attractiveness and the power of wealth
sn37.29:1.8: A female who has the powers of attractiveness and wealth, but not the power of relatives
sn37.29:1.10: But when she has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, and relatives
sn37.29:1.12: A female who has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, and relatives, but not the power of children
sn37.29:1.14: But when she has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, relatives, and children
sn37.29:1.16: A female who has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, relatives, and children, but not the power of ethical behavior
sn37.29:1.18: But when she has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, relatives, children, and ethical behavior
sn37.29:1.20: These are the five powers of a female.”
